name: Peak (Yollie, Astolsko)
description:
If you're having trouble beating the game, watch the playthrough on this side ->

One day, he broke his legs in a freak accident. After realising he would need to pay 8 digits in hospital bills alone, he started crawling up a mountain to evade the bill. But the IRS are coming for him, and he can't go back down...

Made in 3.5 days for Mouse Jam 2 and Mini Jam

Controls:

Mouse- Aim

Left click- Drag to launch yourself

Middle click- Restart from last checkpoint

Right click- Throw crutches/ retrieve crutches 

Credits:

Yollie- Game development, art

Astolsko- Music

Freesound.org- Sound effects
